## SortDirection type

Direction used when sorting rows. - `"asc"` - Ascending order (A-Z, 0-9, oldest to newest) - `"desc"` - Descending order (Z-A, 9-0, newest to oldest)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SortDirection = "asc" | "desc";
```
